info.title: Information
info.localDesc: ¬∑ Local Chats: Named conversations (saved, loaded from JSON, or opened from cloud) are auto-saved every 15 seconds. All conversations are stored in JSON format at {path}. Different paths can be used on different devices.
info.cloudDesc: ¬∑ Cloud Chats: Conversations uploaded to the cloud, which can be pulled to local at any time.

configRequired.title: Cloud Chats
configRequired.webdavDescription: Please configure WebDAV URL and data path (data_path) in 'Settings' to use this feature.
configRequired.localPathDescription: Please configure your local chat storage path in the 'Settings' page first

rename.promptMessage: Please enter the new conversation name.

tooltips.uploadChanges: Upload {count} new or updated local files
tooltips.downloadChanges: Download {count} new or updated cloud files
tooltips.forceUpload: Force upload this file to the cloud (overwrite)
tooltips.forceDownload: Force download this file from the cloud (overwrite)

chats.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete chat '{filename}'?

alerts.pathNotFound: Specified WebDAV data path not found.
alerts.pathCreated: Data path does not exist, has been created automatically.
alerts.syncSuccessUpload: {count} files successfully synced to the cloud.
alerts.syncSuccessDownload: {count} files successfully synced from the cloud.
alerts.syncConfirmUpload: This will upload all local conversations to the cloud, overwriting any files with the same name. Continue?
alerts.syncConfirmDownload: This will download all cloud conversations to your local machine, overwriting any files with the same name. Continue?
alerts.syncNoUpload: All local files are up-to-date or newer on the cloud. Nothing to upload.
alerts.syncNoDownload: All cloud files are synced or newer locally. Nothing to download.
alerts.confirmSyncDeleteMessage: {count} of the selected files also exist on the {location}. Do you want to delete them from there as well?

regex.label: Custom Regex Match
regex.tooltip:
When the input type is 'Text', you can set a regular expression here to match specific content.
1. Format must be /.../flags, e.g., /^https?:\/\// to match URLs.
2. Important: Backslashes \ in the expression must be escaped as \\.
3. flags are optional, like i for case-insensitivity (e.g., /hello/i).
4. Leave empty to match any text.

Quick Reference:
‚Ä¢ . - Matches any character except newline
‚Ä¢ \d - Matches any digit
‚Ä¢ \s - Matches any whitespace (space, tab, newline)
‚Ä¢ \S - Matches any non-whitespace
‚Ä¢ \w - Matches word characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _)
‚Ä¢ [...] - Matches any character in the set, e.g., [abc]
‚Ä¢ * - Matches 0 or more times
‚Ä¢ + - Matches 1 or more times
‚Ä¢ ? - Matches 0 or 1 time
‚Ä¢ ^ - Matches start of string
‚Ä¢ $ - Matches end of string

prompts.llmParametersRemark: Only effective for the current Quick Prompt model; no longer effective after switching to other models

alerts.noPromptsToAssign: No other prompts available to assign to this tag.
alerts.modelsReplacedSuccess: Successfully replaced the model for {count} prompts.
alerts.refreshSuccess: Quick Prompts configuration has been refreshed!

tooltips.sendDirect: When enabled, selected text or screenshot will be sent directly to the AI.
tooltips.sendFile: When enabled, selected files will be sent directly to the AI for processing.
tooltips.ifTextNecessary: When enabled, a timestamp will be automatically added before the text to ensure every request contains text, satisfying requirements of some providers (e.g., Vertex).
tooltips.reasoningEffort: Sets the computational budget for the model's reasoning process. Higher values may yield more thorough answers but increase latency and cost.
tooltips.isAlwaysOnTopTooltip: Enable to keep the window always on top of other windows.
tooltips.autoCloseOnBlurTooltip: Enable to close the standalone window when it loses focus.
tooltips.defaultMcpServers: When set, the selected MCP services will be automatically enabled when this assistant is opened in a standalone window.

prompts.voiceTooltip: Select a voice to enable speech output by default. The model must support speech output. Select 'Disable' to not use it.
prompts.defaultMcpServersPlaceholder: Select default MCP services for this assistant

alerts.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the MCP server '{name}'?
alerts.invalidJson: Invalid JSON format. Please check your input.

jsonDialog.title: Edit MCP Servers JSON
jsonDialog.description: Warning: Directly editing the JSON can cause issues if the format is incorrect. Proceed with caution.

persistent.label: Persistent Connection
persistent.tooltip: After enabling, a persistent connection will be maintained, which will occupy one slot of the total number of connections (up to 5). This is suitable for certain Stdio services that cannot be disconnected.

providers.apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter API Key (multiple can be entered, separated by commas)
providers.apiKeyDescription: You can enter multiple API keys separated by commas.
providers.selectProviderOrAdd: Select a provider or add a new one
providers.noModelsFoundError: No models found or API error.

voice.title: Voice Settings  (Voice Name - Custom Description)
voice.description: Manage the list of voices available for speech synthesis.
voice.addPromptMessage: Please enter the voice name (e.g., alloy).
voice.editPromptMessage: Please enter the new voice name

isAlwaysOnTop_global.label: Global Always on Top
isAlwaysOnTop_global.description: Globally control whether all assistant windows are always on top

autoCloseOnBlur_global.label: Global Auto-close on Blur
autoCloseOnBlur_global.description: Globally control whether all assistant windows close automatically on blur

skipLineBreak.label: Skip Line Breaks on Send
skipLineBreak.description: Enable to skip line breaks when selecting text.

ctrlEnter.label: Ctrl+Enter to Send
ctrlEnter.description: Enable to send messages by pressing Ctrl+Enter.

notification.label: Show Success Notification
notification.description: Enable to show a notification on successful response.

fixPosition.label: Fix Window Position
fixPosition.description: Enable to fix the position where the dialog window appears.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.exportDesc: Export all current settings to a JSON file. Note: The configuration file contains sensitive information, do not share it.
dataManagement.importDesc: Import settings from a JSON file. This will overwrite current settings.
